movies.title: The Heartbreak Kid
movies.plot: Michael Jenkins' movie "The Heartbreak Kid" centres on the coming of age relationship between a teacher (Claudia Karvin), and a wild and spirited student (Alex Demitrides). The teacher , Christiana jolts the young man, Nicks sexuality beyond belief. This story is centred in the Australian-Greek life upbringing which Nick is shown the truth about street life. Christiana is locked into traditions of how women are restricted into Greek traditions of women in the work place. Also how she commits herself into destined life of marriage with children which leaves her living across the street with her mom and dad.
movies.simplePlot: Michael Jenkins' movie "The Heartbreak Kid" centres on the coming of age relationship between a teacher (Claudia Karvin), and a wild and spirited student (Alex Demitrides). The teacher , ...

biography.bio: Claudia Karvan is one of Australia's most recognized actresses, having achieved popular success and critical acclaim through her work in film and television. Having begun work at 14, Karvan has an extensive filmography. She first appeared in Gillian Armstrong's High Tide (1987) with Judy Davis, then in Phillip Noyce's Echoes of Paradise (1987). Since this time Karvan has captivated audiences with her remarkable talent and beauty. Although celebrated for her dramatic prowess, Karvan first exhibited her gift for comedy in The Big Steal (1990). Then - amongst other projects - she appeared in the romantic-drama The Heartbreak Kid (1993), for which she won an Australian Film Critics Circle award for Best Actress. In 1996 Karvan starred in the film that she is probably best known for, Dating the Enemy (1996), opposite Guy Pearce. Karvan delighted audiences in this romantic-comedy with her charming portrayal of a man trapped in a woman's body. She later went on to star in another romantic comedy, with another Australian favorite
biography.name: Claudia Karvan

biography.bio: Alex Dimitriades was born on December 28, 1973 in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia as Alexander Dimitriades. He is an actor, known for Ghost Ship (2002), De plein fouet (1998) and Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo (2005).
biography.name: Alex Dimitriades

biography.bio: Steve Bastoni is one of Australia's most versatile and respected actors, he has a string of impressive credits to his name including the Emmy award winning On the Beach, Matrix Reloaded and the Water Diviner to name a few. His performance as Alfredo in 15 Amore garnered an AFI award nomination for Best Actor in a leading role and resulted in Bob Ellis comparing him to Marlon Brando and Anthony Quinn in their prime. His portrayal of Michael Drury in the classic mini-series Blue Murder is worthy of the critical acclaim it received, as are his many stage credits including his turn as Bill Sykes in Cameron Macintosh's Oliver. His portrayal of Wayne in Ben Elton's Popcorn was chillingly exact and resulted in a green room award nomination.
biography.name: Steve Bastoni

biography.bio: Nick Lathouris is known for his work on Mad Max (1979), Death in Brunswick (1990) and Where the Green Ants Dream (1984).
biography.name: Nick Lathouris

biography.bio: George Vidalis is an actor, known for The Heartbreak Kid (1993), The Night We Called It a Day (2003) and Macbeth (2006).
biography.name: George Vidalis

biography.bio: Louise Mandylor is an actress, known for The Heartbreak Kid (1993), Fat Tony & Co (2014) and Tricky Business (2012).
biography.name: Louise Mandylor

biography.placeOfBirth: Parramatta, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
biography.bio: Doris Younane was born on February 25, 1963 in Parramatta, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. She is known for her work on McLeod's Daughters (2001), Hartley, coeurs à vif (1994) and Les traces du mal (1998).
biography.name: Doris Younane

biography.bio: William McInnes was born on September 10, 1961 in Redcliffe, Queensland, Australia. He is an actor and writer, known for Blue Heelers (1994), Unfinished Sky (2007) and Look Both Ways (2005). He was previously married to Sarah Watt.
biography.name: William McInnes

biography.bio: Jasper graduated from the Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts in 1990. He first worked on-set with James Coburn, thirty years ago, and since then has had the opportunity to work beside such luminaries as Russell Crowe and Brian Cox. Jasper recently played a lead villain in Japan's first ever spy-thriller, 'Joker Game,' opposite Kazuya Kamenashi, which went to the top of the Japanese box-office. Also, in his capacity as mentor, Jasper regularly directs self-tests for professional screen tests for professional actors.
biography.name: Jasper Bagg

biography.bio: Fonda Goniadis is an actor, known for De plein fouet (1998) and The Heartbreak Kid (1993).
biography.name: Fonda Goniadis

biography.bio: Vikash Prasad is an actor, known for The Heartbreak Kid (1993).
biography.name: Vikash Prasad

biography.bio: Bao Quach is an actor, known for The Heartbreak Kid (1993), Affliction: Day of Reckoning (2009) and ShoXC: Elite Challenger Series (2007).
biography.name: Bao Quach

biography.bio: Katherine Halliday was born on January 27, 1975. She is an actress, known for Hartley, coeurs à vif (1994), T is for Talk Radio (2011) and The Heartbreak Kid (1993).
biography.name: Katherine Halliday

biography.bio: Chaka Johnson is an actress, known for The Heartbreak Kid (1993).
biography.name: Chaka Johnson

biography.bio: Keith Iosifidis is an actor, known for The Heartbreak Kid (1993).
biography.name: Keith Iosifidis
